mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.user_name as userName, t2.module_type as moduleType FROM t_user t1 LEFT JOIN t_w_use_water_unit_role t2 ON t1.id = t2.person_id WHERE t1.node_code = #{nodeCode} and t2.node_code = #{nodeCode} and t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT unit_type_code AS id, node_code AS nodeCode, unit_type_code AS orgName, 'org' as tag, '1' as son FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{personId} AND node_code = #{nodeCode} order by unit_type_code
